summary: This is an email exchange between Cindy Hopkins and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding a subpoena in the United States vs. Maxwell case. Cindy Hopkins is responding to the subpoena and providing contact information.

persons.name: Cindy Hopkins
persons.context: She is responding to a subpoena in the US vs. Maxwell case and provides her contact information to the prosecutor.

persons.name: Andrew Rohrbach
persons.context: He is copied on the email and is a federal prosecutor in the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: Hopkins is responding to a subpoena issued by the prosecution office where Rohrbach works, indicating a formal legal process.

events.title: Response to Subpoena in US vs. Maxwell
events.description: Cindy Hopkins sends an email responding to a subpoena in the United States vs. Maxwell criminal case.

keyFacts: Cindy Hopkins is responding to a subpoena in the US vs. Maxwell criminal case.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email is dated July 29, 2021, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case at that time.
